rules.natural: If raw material A is compliant with the quality check, then batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.
Either raw material A is compliant with the quality check or raw material B is compliant with the quality check.
Either batch X has production approval in facility 1, or if raw material B is compliant with the quality check, then batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.
Whenever mixing tank 3 is available during the production shift, it is not the case that batch X has production approval in facility 1.
Sterilizer 2 is available during the production shift or mixing tank 3 is available during the production shift.
Under the condition that facility 1 passed the safety audit for the Q3 period, batch X does not have production approval in facility 1.
If facility 1 has completed the safety inspection in the weekly check, then facility 1 passed the safety audit for the Q3 period.

facts.natural: Facility 1 has completed the safety inspection in the weekly check.
It is not the case that sterilizer 2 is available during the production shift.

target.natural: Batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

Batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

(A1 → G).natural: If raw material A is compliant with the quality check, then batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either raw material A is compliant with the quality check or raw material B is compliant with the quality check.

(A2 → G).natural: Provided that raw material B is compliant with the quality check, batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

(A3 ∨ (A2 → G)).natural: Either batch X has production approval in facility 1, or if raw material B is compliant with the quality check, then batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever mixing tank 3 is available during the production shift, it is not the case that batch X has production approval in facility 1.

(A5 ∨ A4).natural: Sterilizer 2 is available during the production shift or mixing tank 3 is available during the production shift.

(A6 → ¬A3).natural: Under the condition that facility 1 passed the safety audit for the Q3 period, batch X does not have production approval in facility 1.

(A7 → A6).natural: If facility 1 has completed the safety inspection in the weekly check, then facility 1 passed the safety audit for the Q3 period.

A4.natural: Mixing tank 3 is available during the production shift.

A6.natural: Facility 1 passed the safety audit for the Q3 period.

A7.natural: Facility 1 has completed the safety inspection in the weekly check.

G.natural: Batch X has manufacturing approval per FDA standards.

¬A3.natural: Batch X does not have production approval in facility 1.

¬A5.natural: It is not the case that sterilizer 2 is available during the production shift.
